Name: Poison Shot
Description: Shoot a poison arrow that deals 50% weapon damage. On hit or land, this arrow creates 3m radius poison cloud that lasts 6s. Foes entering the cloud are poisoned and take 10% weapon damage per second for 20s. This ability cannot headshot.

Name: Infected Arrows
Description: Poison Shot's poison now does 12% weapon damage per second for 20s.

Name: Direct Hit
Description: Direct hits against targets are more powerful and now deal 150% weapon damage.

Name: Evade Shot
Description: Leap back 5m and shoot an arrow dealing 125% weapon damage.

Name: Evasive Knockback
Description: Evade Shot knocks your target back 2m.

Name: Go the Distance
Description: Evade Shot grants you a 15% haste for 5s. (Haste increases movement speed.)

Name: Rain of Arrows
Description: Shoot a barrage of arrows that covers a 3m radius area and deals 150% weapon damage. This ability cannot headshot.

Name: Barbed Arrows
Description: Rain of Arrows causes bleed, dealing 85% weapon damage over 12s.

Name: Hooked Arrows
Description: Rain of Arrows causes a 15% slow for 4s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

Name: Evasive Tactics
Description: Deal 20% more damage for 5s after dodging.

Name: Catch Me If You Can
Description: If surrounded by 3 or more foes within 3m of you, gain 20% haste. (Haste increases movement speed.)

Name: Closing In
Description: Hitting a foe below 50% health reduces all bow ability cooldowns by 5%.

Name: Impale
Description: If you hit a foe with 100% health, inflict a 10% slow for 2s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

Name: Hunter's Insight
Description: Hitting a foe with a debuff grants 5 stamina.

Name: Dodge and Weave
Description: After you dodge, gain 10% haste for 2s. (Haste increases movement speed.)

Name: Archer's Speed
Description: Gain 10% haste for 5s when you swap to your bow. (Haste increases movement speed.) (Cooldown 10s.)

Name: Mark
Description: Deal 10% more damage to foes suffering from a debuff.

Name: Battle Precision
Description: Debuff and damage over time durations last 20% longer.

Name: Knee Shot
Description: Leg shots cause 10% slow for 2s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

Name: Rapid Shot
Description: Shoot 3 consecutive arrows. The first two deal 100% weapon damage each. The last shot causes a knockback and deals 125% weapon damage.

Name: Rapid Accuracy
Description: If all 3 arrows hit the same target, Rapid Shotâ€™s cooldown is reduced by 50%.

Name: Final Blow
Description: The third arrow of Rapid Shot deals 25% extra damage.

Name: Penetrating Shot
Description: Shoot an arrow that deals 150% weapon damage and passes through targets. This attack has a range of 100m.

Name: Blood Soaked Arrow
Description: Penetrating Shot deals 10% increased damage after each hit. (Max 50% damage.)

Name: Deep Strike
Description: Penetrating Shot deals 20% more damage to targets 20m or more away.

Name: Splinter Shot
Description: Shoot an arrow that splits into 3 arrows after traveling 10m. Each arrow deals 50% weapon damage. This ability cannot headshot.

Name: Scatter Shot
Description: Splinter Shot splits into 5 arrows.

Name: Calculated
Description: Each arrow that hits reduces the cooldown of this ability by 10%.

Name: Long Range
Description: Deal 20% more damage to foes at least 10m away.

Name: Aim True
Description: Heavy attack arrows fly faster and deal 30% more damage.

Name: Unbreakable Focus
Description: Receive 10% less damage while aiming.

Name: Finishing Shot
Description: Deal 20% more damage to targets below 50% health.

Name: Opening Strike
Description: Heavy attacks deal 20% increased damage to foes with 100% health.

Name: Surprise Attack
Description: Deal 20% extra damage if you haven't damaged a foe in the last 10s.

Name: Arrow Range
Description: Increases the distance that arrows travel before being affected by gravity by 100%.

Name: Hawkeye
Description: When you land a headshot, heal yourself for 10% of damage done.

Name: Bullseye
Description: Increases critical chance of bow shots by 10%.

Name: Concussion
Description: When you land a headshot, deal 20% more damage and have a 50% chance to get your arrow back.

Name: Pillar of Fire
Description: Invoke a burst of flames at the target area that deals 170% weapon damage. Costs 15 Mana.

Name: First Strike
Description: Pillar of Fire deals 40% more damage to foes at full health.

Name: Arson's Advantage
Description: Gain 10% of your max mana per enemy hit by Pillar of Fire.

Name: Meteor Shower
Description: Call down a rain of meteors for 6 seconds in the target area, dealing 34% weapon damage on initial impact and an additional 20% weapon damage per second while targets remain in the area. Costs 5 Mana Per Second (30 total mana at full cast).

Name: Immolation
Description: The initial hit of Meteor Shower gives you 1% of your max mana for each target hit.

Name: Fiery Determination
Description: Adds grit while casting Meteor Shower. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Name: Judgment of Helios
Description: All hits after the initial impact now deal 25% weapon damage.

Name: Fireball
Description: Shoot a heavy fireball that deals 140% weapon damage on impact and leaves behind a 3m burning field that lasts 6s. The burning field deals 10% weapon damage each second. This ability cannot crit. Costs 25 Mana.

Name: Scorched Earth
Description: Fireball's burning field lasts for 9s.

Name: Catch
Description: Direct hits with Fireball give you 10% of your max mana and reduce your fire staff ability cooldowns by 7%.

Name: Spell Focus
Description: Heavy attacks restore 5% of your max mana on hit.

Name: Fiery Restoration
Description: Heavy attacks reduce fire staff cooldowns by 10% on hit.

Name: Clear Mind
Description: While holding a fire staff and above 50% mana, gain 5% empower. (Empower increases damage.)

Name: Flare
Description: Heavy attacks no longer consume mana.

Name: Singe
Description: Light attacks inflict burning on foes, dealing 3% weapon damage each second for 6s.

Name: Spellslinger
Description: Your fire staff abilities gain an extra 10% chance to critical strike.

Name: Clear Casting
Description: If you haven't taken damage in the last 3s, deal 5% more damage.

Name: Prophet of a Fire God
Description: While holding a fire staff, your critical strike damage is increased by 15%.

Name: Runes of Helios
Description: Using a fire staff ability places a 2m rune on the ground that increases your damage by 25% while standing in the rune. The rune lasts for 7s. (Cooldown 30s).

Name: Incinerate
Description: Cause a fiery explosion around yourself that deals 130% weapon damage and pushes back all enemies 3m. Inflicts burning on struck foes, dealing 3% weapon damage each second for 6s. Costs 22 Mana.

Name: Scorched
Description: Each hit of Incinerate causes an additional stack of burning.

Name: Cauterize Wounds
Description: Restore 20% of Incinerate damage dealt as health.

Name: Flame out!
Description: Incinerate hits twice.

Name: Flamethrower
Description: Create a 4 meter jet of flame from the staff dealing 50% weapon damage every half second. Each hit inflicts burning, dealing 3% weapon damage each second for 6s. Costs 5 Mana per second.

Name: Fire's Reach
Description: Increase the range of Flamethrower by 50%.

Name: Infernal Flames
Description: Increase the base damage of Flamethrower by 25%.

Name: Pyro Dancer
Description: Flamethrower has no cooldown.

Name: Burn Out
Description: Dash forward up to 11 meters through targets dealing 129% weapon damage on hit. Passing through a target will inflict burning that deals 10% weapon damage each second for 8s. Costs 30 Mana.

Name: All In
Description: Fire staff cooldowns are reduced by 5% for each foe hit by Burn Out.

Name: Heat it Up!
Description: Burn Out goes 50% further.

Name: Pyromania
Description: While holding a fire staff and below 50% max health, deal 15% increased damage.

Name: Heat Up
Description: When you block a melee attack, restore 5% of your max mana.

Name: Let it Burn
Description: Whenever burn deals damage, gain 10% fortify for 2s. (Fortify reduces incoming damage.)

Name: Kindle
Description: Burning lasts 20% longer.

Name: Watch it Burn
Description: Critical hits with fire staff abilities inflict burning, dealing 3% weapon damage each second for 6s.

Name: Trial by Fire
Description: When you are struck, create a field of fire around you dealing 5% weapon damage to all to nearby enemies in a 4m radius. Activates when struck in battle and lasts for 10 seconds. (Cooldown 120s.)

Name: Combat Speed
Description: When you activate a fire staff ability gain 10% haste for 5s. (Haste increases movement speed.) (Cooldown 10s.)

Name: Reheat
Description: After 4s without activating a fire staff ability, your mana regen is increased by 400%.

Name: Charge
Description: Charge 10m and deal 120% weapon damage when you reach a target. Press LMB to stop charging and attack early. This ability has grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Name: Frenzied Momentum
Description: Charge now deals 120 - 140% weapon damage based on how far you traveled.

Name: Unpredictable Strike
Description: During Charge you may press RMB to execute a swing attack, dealing 140 - 165% weapon damage based on how far you traveled.

Name: Reap
Description: Extend your axe 5m, pulling foes to you and dealing 110% weapon damage. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equiped in your great axe, this ability inflicts taunt for 4s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

Name: The Collector
Description: Reap range is now 8m.

Name: Hunger
Description: Heal yourself for 30% of damage done by Reap.

Name: Fatal Attraction
Description: After pulling, perform a spin attack dealing 115% weapon damage.

Name: Execute
Description: A powerful overhead attack dealing 200% weapon damage. Deals 300% weapon damage to foes below 50% health.

Name: Unstoppable Greed
Description: Execute gains grit during its attack. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Name: Executioner
Description: Execute has a 100% critical chance against foes below 30% health.

Name: Greed
Description: Light attacks with your great axe give you a stack of 5% damage for 5s. (Max 3 stacks.)

Name: Executioner's Speed
Description: Hitting 2+ targets with a great axe light attack grants 20% haste for 3s. (Haste increases movement speed.)

Name: Critical Gains
Description: When you critical hit with a great axe, heal yourself for 10% of the damage done.

Name: Death's Embrace
Description: Increase armor penetration of great axe attacks by 10% against foes below 50% health.

Name: Frustration
Description: Whenever your attacks are blocked, gain a stack of 15% damage for 10s. (Max 1 stacks.)

Name: Keen Edge
Description: Critical damage increased by 10%.

Name: Critical Condition
Description: Great axe attacks against foes below 30% health have 15% increased critical chance.

Name: Feed
Description: Great axe attacks against foes below 30% health heal you for 10% of damage done.

Name: Blood Lust
Description: You move 30% faster and deal 15% more damage when looking at a foe within 1.3m.

Name: Whirlwind
Description: Spin and attack all nearby foes, dealing 50% weapon damage. If you hit a foe, spin again. (Max 4 spins.) You can move while spinning. This attack cannot backstab. This attack has Grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Name: Gusting Winds
Description: Whirlwind's maximum number of rotations is increased to 7.

Name: Unending Winds
Description: Whirlwind's movement speed is increased by 50%.

Name: Surrounded
Description: If you have 3 or more foes around you, deal 30% more damage.

Name: Maelstrom
Description: Perform a fast, spinning attack that pulls targets closer to you and deals 110% weapon damage.

Name: Storm's Reach
Description: Extends Maelstrom's pull range by 50%.

Name: Absorb
Description: Consumes all projectiles while Maelstrom is active.

Name: No Reprieve
Description: Maelstrom does an extra spin attack, pulling in foes and dealing 110% weapon damage.

Name: Gravity Well
Description: An upward swing dealing 99% weapon damage and projecting a powerful tear in reality that creates a vortex. The vortex pulls foes within 10m to its center for 3s. The collapsing vortex ends with a damaging burst dealing 125% weapon damage.

Name: Crowded Well
Description: Increase burst damage by 10% for each foe caught in the vortex.

Name: Unyielding
Description: Allies gain 10% Fortify while standing in your well. (Fortify reduces incoming damage.)

Name: Mauler's Resolve
Description: If you get hit while holding a great axe and are below 50% health, gain 40 stamina. (20s Cooldown.)

Name: Heavy Pull
Description: Heavy attacks with a great axe pull foes closer to you.

Name: Enduring Strike
Description: Adds grit to great axe heavy attacks, and grants 20% damage reduction during the heavy attack. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Name: Gravity
Description: After you cause a pull, your foe is rooted for 0.25s.

Name: Revenge
Description: When you block an attack with a great axe, gain 5% damage for 5s. (Max 3 stacks.)

Name: Center of Attention
Description: While holding a great axe, gain 10% damage when 3 or more foes are within 4m.

Name: Crowded Protection
Description: While holding a great axe, gain 10% damage absorption when 3 or more foes are within 4m.

Name: Mauler's Fury
Description: Great axe attacks grant a stacking 3% damage increase for 3s. (Max 10 stacks.)

Name: Berserk
Description: Enter a berserk mode that increases all attack damage by 20% for 12s. Cooldown for this ability will not start until the mode ends. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your hatchet, this ability inflicts taunt for 8s to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

Name: On The Hunt
Description: While Berserk is active, your movement speed is increased by 20%.

Name: Berserking Refresh
Description: While Berserk is active, gain a portion of your health back every 4s, up to 30% of your maximum health.

Name: Berserking Purge
Description: Remove all stuns, slows, and roots from yourself when you activate Berserk.

Name: Uninterruptible Berserk
Description: While Berserk is active, your attacks are uninterruptible and you can't be staggered.

Name: Feral Rush
Description: Leap forward and strike twice. The first hit deals 115% weapon damage and the second deals 130% weapon damage.

Name: Dispatch
Description: If target is below 30% health, Feral Rush deals 20% more damage.

Name: Crippling Strikes
Description: If Feral Rush hits a target in the back, it inflicts root, immobilizing the target for 2s.

Name: Raging Torrent
Description: Perform 4 fast attacks, each dealing 90% weapon damage.

Name: Aggressive Approach
Description: Hitting a target with Raging Torrent grants haste, increasing movement speed by 20% for 6s.

Name: Final Blow
Description: Press light attack at the end of Raging Torrent to perform a final attack that deals 120% weapon damage.

Name: Enraged Strikes
Description: Light and heavy attacks deal 20% more damage to targets below 30% health.

Name: Accumulated Power
Description: After 3 successful light attacks against the same target, gain empower, granting a 30% damage increase for 3s or until the next attack.

Name: Relentless Fury
Description: After a successful heavy attack, gain empower, granting a 30% damage increase for the next 4 attacks within 3s.

Name: Desperate Refresh
Description: All cooldowns are reduced by 2% when hitting an enemy with an attack while your health is below 30%.

Name: Against All Odds
Description: Increase base damage by 10% for every enemy within 5m.

Name: Fortifying Strikes
Description: Hitting the same target with 3 consecutive light attacks grants fortify, increasing damage absorption by 15% for 3s.

Name: Frenzied Purge
Description: Remove all bleed, burn, and poison effects from yourself if you hit an enemy while your health is below 30%. (Cooldown 60s.)

Name: Defy Death
Description: When you receive lethal damage, avoid death. You are reduced to 50 health and gain immortality for 3s. (Cooldown 75s.)

Name: Rending Throw
Description: Throw a hatchet up to 25m, dealing 110% weapon damage and applying rend, reducing target's damage absorption by 10% for 10s.

Name: Targeted Impact
Description: Rend effectiveness increased to 15% if the target is further than 8m away.

Name: Opportunistic
Description: If Rending Throw hits a target with an active debuff, it deals an additional 20% damage.

Name: Second Wind
Description: If Rending Throw hits a target with an active debuff, its cooldown is reduced by 20%.

Name: Social Distancing
Description: Throw a hatchet up to 25m forward and dodge backwards. The hatchet deals 130% weapon damage and slows targets by 15% for 3s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

Name: Quick Power
Description: If Social Distancing his a target with an active debuff, your movement speed is increased by 30% for 3s.

Name: Stay Back
Description: Social Distancing's slow effectiveness is increased to 25% and its duration is increased to 4s.

Name: Infected Throw
Description: Throw a hatchet that deals 150% weapon damage. This attack inflicts disease and weaken on your target for 10s. (Disease reduces target's healing efficiency by 30%.) (Weaken reduces target's damage by 10%.)

Name: Mortal Power
Description: Increased the duration of disease and weaken to 15s on targets below 30% health.

Name: Aerial Transmission
Description: Creates a 3m radius disease cloud on impact that lingers in place for 6s.

Name: Aimed Throw
Description: Replaces block with an aimed throw that deals 95% weapon damage. Hold block to enter aimed stance and press light attack to throw. Costs 20 stamina per throw.

Name: Critical Throw
Description: Thrown hatchets are now capable of triggering headshots or random critical hits. Also increases critical hit chance of all attacks by 5%.

Name: Exploitation
Description: All attacks deal 15% additional damage to targets with an active debuff.

Name: On Fire
Description: Every third thrown hatchet hit is a guaranteed critical hit.

Name: Refreshing Throws
Description: Thrown hatchets that hit targets with an active debuff reduce all hatchet ability cooldowns by 5%.

Name: Rejuvenating Crits
Description: Critical hits with light attacks and aimed throws regenerate 10 stamina.

Name: Boot and Rally
Description: Light attacks and aimed throws restore 10 stamina when hitting targets with an active debuff.

Name: Adrenaline Rush
Description: Dodging within 2s of triggering an ability consumes 25% less stamina.

Name: Persistent Hinderance
Description: Hitting a target with a thrown hatchet extends the duration of all hatchet debuffs on that target by 30%.

Name: Ice Spikes
Description: Creates a trail of spikes that start from the player and go out in a straight line for 8m dealing 56% weapon damage. The final spike is a Mighty Spike that will deal 157% weapon damage and apply pushback. Pressing light attack before the path fully forms will spawn the Mighty Spike early. Cost 15 Mana.

Name: Refreshing Spikes
Description: Cooldown for this ability reduced by 10% if an enemy is hit by the Mighty Spike.

Name: Empowered Spikes
Description: Mighty Spike damage increased by 20% when hitting an enemy below 30% health.

Name: Deadly Path
Description: Increases damage by 10% and adds stagger to the path of spikes. Does not increase Mighty Spike damage.

Name: Spiky Reach
Description: Ice shards fire from the sides of the Mighty Spike to hit a wider area. Each shard has a 6m range and deals 118% weapon damage.

Name: Ice Storm
Description: Create a 5m radius storm at the target area that deals 17% weapon damage every 0.33s for 5s. The storm also creates a frosted area that slows enemies in it by 25%. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.) Cost 25 Mana.

Name: Weakening Gust
Description: Incoming damage is increased by 10% for 3s to enemies in Ice Storm while they are below 50% health.

Name: Storm Summoner
Description: Ice Storm mana cost is decreased by 80% while at full mana.

Name: Punishing Storm
Description: Increases damage by 10% for each enemy in Ice Storm.

Name: Wind Chill
Description: Blasts a column of freezing winds forward that pushes back enemies 5m and deals 20% weapon damage each hit. Wind Chill has a total range of 7m with the farthest 2m increasing damage 20% without pushing enemies. Player is able to move during the attack. Cost 20 Mana.

Name: Enduring Chill
Description: Increase duration of Wind Chill by 1s.

Name: Chilling Blast
Description: Increase the damage of the last 2m of the Wind Chill range by 25%.

Name: Cold Reach
Description: Increase damage of light and heavy attacks by 15% for targets farther than 15m.

Name: Critical Rejuvenation
Description: Gain 15 mana whenever you critically hit a target.

Name: Energized Critical
Description: Increase critical damage of ice gauntlet abilities by 10% while stamina is full.

Name: Gathering Storm
Description: Gain 15 mana whenever you hit with 3 consecutive light attacks.

Name: Critical Frost
Description: Increase critical chance by 15% when hitting an enemy in a frosted area or when hitting an enemy with frostbite.

Name: Heavy Freeze
Description: Heavy attacks will root a target if they standing in Ice Storm or have frostbite. Root lasts for 1 second and has a 5 second cooldown.

Name: Ultimate Chill
Description: Ice gauntlet abilities chill targets, increasing ice damage dealt to the target by 25% for 3s.

Name: Ice Pylon
Description: Place a pylon that fires ice projectiles at enemies within 20m. Projectiles deal 50% weapon damage if they hit. Ice Pylon creates a 1m radius frosted area around itself and lasts for 15s unless it is destroyed. Cost 15 Mana.

Name: Greater Pylon
Description: Increases damage of Ice Pylon by 10% against slowed targets.

Name: Pylon Regen
Description: Ice Pylon regenerates to full health 5s after last damage taken.

Name: Pylon Dodge
Description: Dodging with full stamina increases Ice Pylon rate of fire for 3s.

Name: Pylon Refresh
Description: A successful hit from the Ice Pylon extends its lifetime by 1s. (Maximum 45s.)

Name: Ice Shower
Description: Summon a shower of ice that creates a frosted area approximately 1m by 5m that lasts for 4s. Enemies that enter the Ice Shower will be stricken with a powerful frostbite. Frostbite roots for 1s, blocks sprinting and dodging, slows movement speed by 50%, and will remain on target for 3s after exiting the Ice Shower. Cost 25 Mana.

Name: Enduring Shower
Description: Increase Ice Shower duration to 7s.

Name: Quick Shower
Description: Any ally, including self, will get a 25% movement speed boost for 2s when entering Ice Shower.

Name: Frigid Showers
Description: Frostbite applies rend to target, reducing their defense by 10%.

Name: Entombed
Description: Entomb yourself in ice to become invulnerable and greatly increase mana regeneration. The tomb lasts for 10s but can be destroyed early. Press block to exit the tomb normally or press light attack to exit while causing a damaging knockback at the cost of 20 mana. Cost 0 Mana.

Name: Strengthened Tomb
Description: Increase defense by 25% for 3s after breaking out of Entombed.

Name: Cleansing Tomb
Description: Cleanse all debuffs when Entombed activates.

Name: Blocking Stamina
Description: Blocking an attack with the ice gauntlet will convert mana to stamina. Converts 3 mana to 15 stamina.

Name: Quick Frost
Description: Increase movement speed by 10% in a frosted area.

Name: Empowered Frost
Description: Gain 3 mana for each spell cast while in a frosted area.

Name: Frozen Touch
Description: Slow enemies by 25% for 2s when they hit you with a melee attack while you have 100% health. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

Name: Refreshing Frost
Description: Reduce the cooldown of all ice gauntlet abilities by 20% when casting an ability in a frosted area.

Name: Defiant Freeze
Description: Casting an ice gauntlet ability creates an ice hardened layer, granting 20% fortify for 2s. (Fortify reduces incoming damage.)

Name: Ultimate Frost
Description: Doubles Ice Pylon's health and extends Ice Pylon's frosted area radius to 5m. Standing in this frosted area doubles Quick Frost and Empowered Frost bonuses.

Name: Divine Embrace
Description: Heal target for 120% weapon damage. Costs 25 Mana.

Name: Privilege
Description: Divine Embrace costs 20 Mana.

Name: Shared Struggle
Description: If your target is below 50% health, heal one additional ally within 8m for the same amount.

Name: Rebound
Description: If the ally healed by Shared Struggle is below 50% health, heal another ally within 8m of that ally.

Name: Sacred Ground
Description: Create an area on the ground with a 3m radius that lasts for 12s. Allies in the area are healed for 16% weapon damage every second. Costs 15 Mana.

Name: Holy Ground
Description: Regenerate stamina and mana 50% faster while in Sacred Ground.

Name: Blessed
Description: While allies are in Sacred Ground, they are healed for 50% more from all healing.

Name: Splash of Light
Description: You and all group members within 100m are healed for 60% weapon damage. Costs 15 Mana.

Name: Shared Recovery
Description: For each ally healed that is below 50% health, you gain 5% of your max mana.

Name: Purify
Description: Splash of Light also removes 1 debuff.

Name: Absolved
Description: Life staff's light and heavy attacks no longer consume mana.

Name: Mending Touch
Description: Heavy attacks now remove 1 debuff when passing through an ally.

Name: Blissful Touch
Description: Light attacks now heal for 16% weapon damage when passing through an ally.

Name: Revitalize
Description: When you hit with a light attack, reduce life staff ability cooldowns by 5%.

Name: Desperate Speed
Description: When you heal an ally below 50% health, life staff ability cooldowns are reduced by 10%. (Can only be triggered once every 5s.)

Name: Enchanted Justice
Description: When hit in battle, activate a healing aura for you and nearby friends in a 4m radius. The aura heals for 8% weapon damage each second for 6s. (Cooldown 120s.)

Name: Sacred Protection
Description: While holding a life staff, increase the amount of incoming healing to all friendlies in your group by 5%

Name: Intensify
Description: When you hit with a heavy attack, gain a stacking 10% bonus to healing effectiveness for 10s. (Max 3 stacks.)

Name: Divine Blessing
Description: When you heal an ally below 50% health, they are healed for 30% more.

Name: Orb of Protection
Description: Shoot out a light projectile that grants 10% fortify for 20s, heals an ally for 10% of weapon damage, and deals 146% weapon damage when it hits an enemy. (Fortify reduces incoming damage.) Costs 16 Mana.

Name: Protector's Blessing
Description: If Orb of Protection hits an ally, they gain recovery for 10s. (Recovery heals for 6% weapon damage every second.)

Name: Shared Protection
Description: If you successfully heal an ally with Orb of Protection, you also gain fortify and recovery.

Name: Aegis
Description: When this projectile hits, it effects all allies within a 3m radius.

Name: Light's Embrace
Description: Heal target for 80% weapon damage +30% more for each buff on that target. Costs 18 Mana.

Name: Inspire
Description: When you heal a target with Light's Embrace, that target gains 25 stamina.

Name: Connection
Description: When you heal a target with Lights Embrace, gain 2% of your max mana for each buff your target has.

Name: Magnify
Description: When you heal a target with Light's Embrace, extend the duration of life staff buffs on that target by 2s.

Name: Beacon
Description: Shoot out a light projectile that deals 146% weapon damage to enemies, attaches to its target and heals all nearby allies for 16% weapon damage each second for 10s. Costs 16 Mana.

Name: Infused Light
Description: Beacon's area of effect is now 50% larger.

Name: Radiance's Blessing
Description: Beacon lasts 5s longer.

Name: Speed of Light
Description: When Beacon heals a target it also applies 20% haste for 3s. (Haste increases movement speed.)

Name: Bend Light
Description: After a dodge, your heals are 20% more effective for 5s.

Name: Defensive Light
Description: When you block a melee attack, gain 5% max mana.

Name: Protector's Touch
Description: Life staff's light and heavy attacks grant 15% fortify for 3s when hitting an enemy. (Fortify reduces incoming damage.)

Name: Protector's Strength
Description: If you have a buff heal for 10% more.

Name: Balance
Description: When you get hit while below 50% health, gain 10% haste for 5s. (Cooldown 20s.)

Name: Spirits United
Description: Increases mana regeneration for you and group members by 3%.

Name: Glowing Focus
Description: Life Staff buffs you grant last 20% longer.

Name: Power Shot
Description: Overload your musket with gun powder, causing the next shot to deal 150% weapon damage. Does not stack with other overload shots.

Name: Initial Engagement
Description: When you hit with Power Shot, gain empower, increasing damage by 10% for 5s.

Name: First Blood
Description: Power Shot deals 10% additional damage to targets with full health.

Name: Bullseye
Description: Power Shot headshots reduce Power Shot's cooldown by 15%.

Name: Powder Burn
Description: Overload your musket with gun powder, causing the next shot to deal 110% weapon damage and inflict a burn that deals 20% weapon damage per second for 9s. Does not stack with other overload shots.

Name: Backdraft
Description: Standard musket shots deal 12% additional damage if they hit a burning target.

Name: Chronic Trauma
Description: If Powder Burn is a headshot, the burn duration is extended to 13s.

Name: Shooter's Stance
Description: Player enters a crouching aim stance to enhance shooting performance. While in this stance, shots deal 100% weapon damage, mobility is reduced to zero and reload time is reduced by 75%. Shooter's Stance ends after 3 shots.

Name: Shoot More
Description: Shots fired before exiting stance increased to 5.

Name: Marksman
Description: If 3 consecutive shots hit the same target, reduce all other musket cooldowns by 25%.

Name: Critical Reload
Description: Landing 3 headshots within 5s of each other grants an instant reload.

Name: Called Shot
Description: Increase musket damage by 5% after aiming down sights for more than 3s.

Name: Greater Accuracy
Description: Accuracy penalty while hipfiring removed.

Name: Empowering Headshot
Description: On a successful headshot, gain empower, increasing damage dealt by 10% for 5s.

Name: Ballistic Advantage
Description: Removes damage fall off from standard musket shots on targets more than 50m away.

Name: Called Shot Resupply
Description: Standard attack headshots reduce all musket ability cooldowns by 10%.

Name: Hit Your Mark
Description: Increased headshot and critical hit damage to a target the further the target is away from the player. Maximum increase is 15% at or beyond 100m away. Does not forgo damage fall off.

Name: Heightened Precision
Description: While aiming, successful hits with a musket grant a stackable 2.5% damage increase. This effect ends when the player stops aiming down sight or after more than 5s passes between shots. (Max 6 stacks.)

Name: Sniper
Description: Adds an optional 3x zoom view when aiming musket shots. Use mouse wheel up or down to adjust zoom while aiming. Also grants a 15% damage increase to all headshots.

Name: Traps
Description: Deploy a trap that lasts for 20s. When triggered, it causes its target to be rooted, immobilizing them for 3s.

Name: Trapped Damage
Description: Traps apply rend to targets that trigger them, increasing damage taken by 20% for 3s.

Name: Scent of Blood
Description: Dealing damage to a trapped target heals you for 100% of weapon damage dealt.

Name: Double Trap
Description: Ability to have two active traps.

Name: Sticky Bomb
Description: Throw a short range bomb that sticks to anything it makes contact with. Detonation will occur 3 seconds after impact dealing 235% weapon damage to all targets within 3m.

Name: Unflinching Walk
Description: Sticky Bomb grants the player 40 stamina when it deals damage with an explosion.

Name: Sticky Slow
Description: Direct hits with the Sticky Bomb cause the target to be slowed by 15% for 3s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

Name: Stopping Power
Description: Overload your musket with gun powder, causing the next shot to deal 120% weapon damage, staggering the target and knocking them back 3m. Does not stack with other overload shots.

Name: Lasting Impression
Description: Targets hit with Stopping Power are exhausted, reducing their stamina regeneration speed by 10% for 8s.

Name: Supplementary Repulsion
Description: Targets hit with Stopping Power are slowed by 10% for 8 seconds. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

Name: Salt On The Wounds
Description: Deal 10% increased damage to targets below 30% health.

Name: Back It Up
Description: Walking/Strafing movement speed increased by 10% when an enemy is within 8m of player.

Name: Weakened Defense
Description: Increases the stamina damage from standard shots dealt to enemies blocking with shields by 50%. Increases armor penetration against targets that are not blocking with a shield by 10%.

Name: Empowering Weakness
Description: Hitting a target with an active debuff grants empower, increasing your damage by 5% for 5s.

Name: Hustle
Description: After a dodge, gain a 10% haste for 3s. (Haste increases movement speed.)

Name: Tactical Reload
Description: Dodging reloads the musket. (Can only trigger once every 6s.)

Name: Energy Burst
Description: Attacking a target with an active debuff restores 5 stamina.

Name: Kick 'em When They're Down
Description: Deal 10% extra damage to targets with an active crowd control status effect. (Slow, Root, Stun.)

Name: Lethal Combo
Description: Increase musket damage by 20% against targets affected by Trapper tree status effects.

Name: Tondo
Description: Slash so quickly that it extends the reach of your blade up to 5m. This strike deals 50% weapon damage and applies a bleed that will deal and additional 85% weapon damage over 12s. This bleed can stack up to 3 times, refreshing previous applications.

Name: Thirst For Blood
Description: When applying the first bleed stack to an opponent, Tondo's cooldown is reduced by 10%.

Name: And Again
Description: If you hit only one target, even on a blocked hit, Tondo's cooldown is reduced by 25%.

Name: Proper Spacing
Description: Increases initial hit damage from Tondo by 100% if you are at least 4m away from your target.

Name: Flurry
Description: Enter a posed stance and unleash a series of five quick thrust attacks with each strike dealing more weapon damage starting at 47% and ending at 83%. Flurry can be canceled by dodging.

Name: Overwhelm
Description: Each hit of Flurry does 25% more block damage.

Name: To the Bone
Description: Each hit of Flurry extends the rapier's bleed by 1s. Future stacking applications of this extended bleed will also be extended to its longer duration.

Name: Fleeting Strikes
Description: Each hit of Flurry reduces its cooldown by 7%.

Name: Finalize
Description: The last hit of Flurry will cause the enemy to stagger.

Name: Flourish and Finish
Description: Flourish performs an attack dealing 90% weapon damage and knocking back enemies. Pressing light attack at the end of Flourish will perform the followup attack, Finish. Finish lunges forward dealing 120% direct weapon damage and consumes all rapier bleeds on any target hit dealing 110% of their damage immediately.

Name: With Flair
Description: Gain grit on both Flourish and Finish. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Name: Swagger
Description: Gain 20 stamina when successfully hitting a target with Finish.

Name: Fuel
Description: Each tick of damage from Tondo's bleed reduces the cooldown of this ability by 3.5%.

Name: Bloody End
Description: Finish deals 150% of the rapier's bleed damage instead of only 110%.

Name: Light Edge
Description: Increase damage from both middle swipe attacks in the light attack chain by 8%.

Name: Refreshing Strikes
Description: Reduce all rapier cooldowns by 1% on any hit.

Name: Heavy Puncture
Description: Any heavy attack on a bleeding enemy will extend their rapier bleeds by 2 seconds. Future stacking applications of this extended bleed will also be extended to its longer duration.

Name: Unerring
Description: Deal 5% more damage to targets with a rapier bleed.

Name: Engarde
Description: Deal 10% more damage when your target has greater than 50% health.

Name: Riposte
Description: Enter into a defensive stance for 1s. If struck during this ability, counter the attacker dealing 50% weapon damage and stunning them briefly for 2s. You are briefly invulnerable upon a successful Riposte. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your rapier, this ability inflicts taunt for 4s to all foes within 5m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

Name: Insult to Injury
Description: If the Riposte is triggered successfully, all of your attacks become uninterruptible for 3s.

Name: Priority
Description: Reduce the cooldown of other rapier abilities by 20% when landing a Riposte stun.

Name: Lasting Consequence
Description: Increase the stun from Riposte to 2.5s.

Name: Fleche
Description: Leave the ground lunging forward for 10m in a stabbing motion and pierce through enemies dealing 145% weapon damage.

Name: Quick Lunge
Description: Killing with this ability reduces its cooldown by 80%.

Name: Backside
Description: After performing Fleche, your next critical strike within 5s will deal 15% more damage.

Name: Interruption
Description: Pressing light attack any time during Fleche will stop and perform a static, continuation attack dealing 115% damage.

Name: Evade
Description: Perform a small, reliable sidestep in your current movement direction that cancels any current activity and provides momentary invulnerability. Light attacks made during Evade are performed exceptionally fast.

Name: Breathe In
Description: Gain 20 stamina immediately on use.

Name: Allegro
Description: Gain 20% haste for 3s on use. (Haste increases movement speed.)

Name: Adagio
Description: Evading forward gains 15% increased damage on your next light attack. Ends on hit or after 1s.

Name: Crescendo
Description: Individual successful light attacks reduce the cooldown of this ability by 30% each.

Name: Perfectionist
Description: Deal 10% more damage when your health is full.

Name: Controlled Breathing
Description: Gain 3 stamina on any hit.

Name: Swiftness
Description: Gain 3% haste for 4s on rapier hits. Can stack up to 5 times. (Haste increases movement speed.)

Name: Desperation
Description: Deal 10% more damage when your stamina is below 40%.

Name: Momentum
Description: Deal 30% increased damage on your next light or heavy attack after performing an ability. Ends on hit or after 3s.

Name: Red Curtains
Description: Critical strikes reduce all cooldowns by 5%.

Name: Javelin
Description: Throw your spear, dealing 125% weapon damage and staggering on hit.

Name: Forceful Impact
Description: Targets are knocked down on hit.

Name: Refreshing Precision
Description: Headshots reduce Javelin cooldown by 50%.

Name: Deadly Distance
Description: Javelin deals 2.5% bonus damage per meter traveled. (Max 100%.)

Name: Sweep
Description: Sweep the target's legs, dealing 75% weapon damage and knocking them down.

Name: Tenacious Sweep
Description: Grit is now active during the attack. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Name: Coup de GrÃ¢ce
Description: Press Basic Attack during Sweep to follow up with a heavy stab that deals 150% weapon damage.

Name: Cyclone
Description: Spin attack that deals 130% weapon damage, pushes targets back 3m and applies 50% slow for 3s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

Name: Invigorating Combo
Description: Restore 25 stamina per target hit.

Name: Strong Momentum
Description: Grit is now active during the attack. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Name: Deadly Consistency
Description: Deal 10% increased damage on consecutive heavy attacks against a single target. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Deadly Reach
Description: Critical chance is increased by 10% when attacking targets that are at least 3m away.

Name: Refreshing Reach
Description: Successful heavy attacks reduce all spear cooldowns by 15%.

Name: Evasive Maneuvers
Description: Dodging backwards consumes 20% less stamina for 2s after a successful hit.

Name: Invigorating Crits
Description: Restore 20 stamina on critical hits.

Name: Merciless Strength
Description: Deal 25% increased damage against knocked down targets.

Name: Defensive Stance
Description: Gain fortify after successful heavy attacks, increasing damage absorption by 15% for 2s.

Name: Strong Conditioning
Description: Stamina regeneration rate is increased by 30% when your stamina is below 50%.

Name: Reserved Strength
Description: Deal 25% increased damage while stamina is full.

Name: Skewer
Description: Rush forward and skewer your target, dealing 125% weapon damage and applying bleed. Bleed deals 20% weapon damage every 1s for 10s.

Name: Deadly Ambush
Description: Skewer deals 20% increased damage against targets that have full health.

Name: Follow Through
Description: Gain empower if Skewer critical hits, increasing damage by 20% for 10s.

Name: Deep Wound
Description: Bleed duration increased to 15s.

Name: Perforate
Description: Execute 3 quick piercing strikes that each deal 80% weapon damage and apply rend, reducing the target's damage absorption by 5% for 10s.

Name: Rupturing Strikes
Description: Rend increased to 10% per strike against targets above 50% health.

Name: Impactful Strikes
Description: Target is staggered if you successfully land all 3 hits.

Name: Vault Kick
Description: Use your spear to vault forward and kick your target, dealing 75% weapon damage. Applies stun for 1.5s. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your spear, this ability inflicts taunt for 2s when it hits. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

Name: Relentless Blows
Description: Gain empower after successful hits on targets below 50% health, increasing damage by 20% for 5s.

Name: Continuous Motion
Description: Cooldowns for other spear abilities are reduced by 30% on successful hit.

Name: Precise Jabs
Description: Light attacks have a 5% increased critical chance.

Name: Refreshing Jabs
Description: All spear ability cooldowns are reduced by 10% on the second hit of the light attack chain.

Name: Crippling Jabs
Description: The last hit of the light attack chain applies 30% slow for 3s to targets below 30% health. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

Name: Finishing Blows
Description: Deal 15% increased damage against targets with less than 30% health.

Name: Unerring Precision
Description: Deal 20% increased damage against targets with active grit.

Name: Aggressive Maneuvers
Description: The first successful hit with an ability within 2s of dodging reduces all spear cooldowns by 20%.

Name: Exacerbating Crits
Description: Critical hits extend the duration of your spear debuffs and damage over time effects by 20%.

Name: Exposed Wounds
Description: Critical chance is increased by 15% when attacking a bleeding target.

Name: Exploited Weakness
Description: Deal 10% bonus damage for each debuff on your target. (Max 30%.)

Name: Reverse Stab
Description: A stab attack that deals 175% weapon damage.

Name: Unstoppable Stab
Description: Reverse Stab now has Grit. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Name: Tactician
Description: On a successful hit with Reverse Stab, all sword cooldowns are reduced by 25%.

Name: Whirling Blade
Description: Deal 145% weapon damage to all foes within 2m.

Name: Opportunity
Description: Whirling Blade inflicts a 5% rend for 10s. (Rend reduces target's defense.)

Name: Tactical Strike
Description: Whirling Blade reduces its own cooldown by 10% for each enemy hit.

Name: Leaping Strike
Description: Leap 6m and deal 150% weapon damage.

Name: Final Strike
Description: If you hit a foe below 30% health, deal 50% more damage.

Name: Cowardly Punishment
Description: If Leaping Strike hits a target in the back, it inflicts a 50% slow for 8s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

Name: Empowered Stab
Description: Successful heavy attacks grant you 30% empower for 5s. (Empower increases damage.)

Name: Achilles' Heel
Description: The final attack in your light attack chain inflicts a 20% slow for 2s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

Name: Precision
Description: Sword and shield critical strike chance increased by 10%.

Name: Freeing Justice
Description: Successfully hitting with a heavy attack causes you to lose 1 debuff.

Name: Mobility
Description: Move 33% faster while blocking.

Name: Counter Attack
Description: When you block an attack, gain a stack of 3% empower for 5s. (Empower increases damage.) (Max 5 stacks.)

Name: Opportunist
Description: Deal 10% more damage to slowed foes.

Name: Critical Precision
Description: On critical, gain 20% haste for 5s. (Haste increases movement speed)

Name: Confidence
Description: While health is full, deal 15% more damage.

Name: Leadership
Description: While holding a sword, the damage of all group members is increased by 10%.

Name: Shield Bash
Description: Deals 50% weapon damage and stuns foes in front of you for 2s. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your sword, this ability inflicts taunt for 6s to all enemies hit. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

Name: Intimidating Bash
Description: Shield Bash causes greatly increased threat and deals 100% more damage.

Name: Concussive Bash
Description: Shield Bash stun duration increased by 1s.

Name: Shield Rush
Description: Rush forward 5m and knock back foes. This attack deals 125% weapon damage.

Name: Improved Rush
Description: On a successful hit, all enemies within 5m are weakened 10% for 10s. (Weaken reduces damage.)

Name: Intimidating Rush
Description: On a successful hit, all enemies within 5m of you are slowed by 30% for 4s. (Slow reduces target's movement speed.)

Name: Defiant Stance
Description: For 8s, reduce the incoming base damage from attackers by 30%. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your sword, this ability inflicts taunt for 6s to all enemies within 8m. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

Name: Final Countdown
Description: If your health is above 50%, damage reduction is increased by 20%.

Name: Restoration
Description: When Defiant Stance ends, heal 15% of your max health.

Name: Sturdy Shield
Description: Grants an additional 15% physical armor.

Name: Sturdy Grip
Description: Stamina damage is reduced by 15% when blocking a melee attack with a shield.

Name: Elemental Resistance
Description: Reduce damage from all magical types by 10%.

Name: Defensive Training
Description: When you block an attack, gain 10% fortify for 5s. (Fortify reduces incoming damage.)

Name: High Grip
Description: Stamina damage is reduced by 15% when blocking a ranged attack with a shield.

Name: One with the Shield
Description: When you block with a shield, all sword and shield cooldowns are reduced by 1%.

Name: Final Blow
Description: The third attack in your light attack chain deals 15% more damage and causes more threat.

Name: Invigorating Bulwark
Description: Gain 15 stamina when hitting a target with Shield Bash or Shield Rush.

Name: Recuperation
Description: All incoming healing and regeneration increased by 10%.

Name: Defensive Formation
Description: While blocking, reduce damage to all allies within 2m by 30%. (Cooldown 1s.)

Name: Armor Breaker
Description: A powerful swing that penetrates 35% of the target's armor and deals 140% weapon damage.

Name: Indomitable
Description: Adds grit to Armor Breaker. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Name: Lasting Trauma
Description: Armor Breaker inflicts rend on the target, reducing damage absorption by 20% for 10s.

Name: Opening Act
Description: Increase Armor Breaker damage by 25% against targets at full health.

Name: Mighty Gavel
Description: An overhead leaping attack that crushes down on enemies, dealing 170% weapon damage.

Name: Summary Judgment
Description: Increases Mighty Gavel damage by 20% to targets below 30% health.

Name: Impact Fracture
Description: Increase stamina damage done by Mighty Gavel by 25%.

Name: Expedite
Description: After a successful Mighty Gavel attack, gain haste, increasing player's movement speed by 30% for 3s.

Name: Justice For All
Description: Pressing light attack during Mighty Gavel performs a followup attack that deals 220% weapon damage.

Name: Wrecking Ball
Description: Strike the ground with your war hammer, dealing 130% weapon damage and flattening your target.

Name: Safety Measures
Description: On a successful hit, gain fortify, granting 20% damage resistance for 7s.

Name: Breathing Room
Description: All targets within 1.5m of target hit are also flattened.

Name: Epitome Of Bonk!
Description: Increase armor penetration by 10% for all war hammer light and heavy attacks.

Name: Hammer Time
Description: Gain empower on heavy attacks, increasing attack damage by 20% for 4s.

Name: Exhaustive Attacks
Description: All war hammer abilities apply exhaust, slowing target's stamina regeneration by 20% for 5s. (Does not stack.)

Name: Hardened Steel
Description: Adds grit to war hammer heavy attacks, and grants 20% damage reduction while the heavy attack grit is active. (Grit prevents you from being staggered by incoming attacks.)

Name: Contemption
Description: Increase heavy attack damage by 15% against targets under 30% health.

Name: Quick Recovery
Description: Heavy attacks that hit reduce cooldowns by 7%.

Name: Power Through Pain
Description: Deal 35% extra damage for 1s after taking damage.

Name: Clear Out
Description: A wide swing that knocks enemies back 4m and deals 115% weapon damage.

Name: Power Cleaner
Description: Hitting a target with Clear Out grants fortify, providing a 10% defense bonus for 4s to all friendlies within 6m.

Name: Clean and Refreshed
Description: Clear Out's cooldown is reduced by 5% per enemy hit with the ability.

Name: Swing Away
Description: Using Clear Out on a target grants haste, increasing movement speed by 30% for 3s.

Name: Shockwave
Description: Slam your war hammer into the ground, causing a 3m radius earthquake that deals 80% weapon damage. Stuns to all impacted targets for 2s. Taunt Gem Compatible: If you have a Carnelian gem equipped in your war hammer, this ability inflicts taunt for 6s to all enemies hit. (Taunt causes monsters to focus only on you.)

Name: Frailty
Description: The trauma of the attack causes weaken, decreasing the damage dealt from the target's attacks by 10% for 10s.

Name: Meteoric Crater
Description: Expands the range Shockwave to a 4m radius.

Name: Path Of Destiny
Description: A powerful ground strike that erupts a linear wave of energy in front of the player, dealing 110% weapon damage to all targets in its path.

Name: Seismic Waves
Description: Path of Destiny now staggers all targets in its path.

Name: Stimulated Reduction
Description: Ability cooldown reduced by 5% for each enemy hit with Path of Destiny.

Name: Outnumbered
Description: Increase damage absorption by 10% if surrounded by 2 or more enemies within 3m.

Name: I Can Do This All Day
Description: Reduce stamina consumption by 30% when blocking melee attacks.

Name: Guarded Sprint
Description: Reduce damage taken by 10% while sprinting.

Name: Acceleration
Description: Reduce war hammer cooldowns by 7% when using light attacks against targets with an active debuff.

Name: Facilitated Expedition
Description: After hitting a target with an active debuff, gain haste, increasing movement speed by 15% for 3s.

Name: Concussive Impact
Description: Deal 15% increased damage against targets affected by war hammer debuffs.

Name: Prevailing Spirit
Description: Regain 35% of damage dealt as health when using a Crowd Crusher ability.

Name: Resurgence
Description: After 2 light attacks with the war hammer, debuff durations on player are reduced by 25%. (Cooldown 5s.)

Name: Aftershock
Description: Whenever a target is affected by a crowd control effect, they are slowed by 20% for 4s.

Name: Void Blade
Description: Summon a blade of Void energy that converts your basic attacks to melee. Tap Basic Attack to perform a quick slash that deals 100% weapon damage or hold to perform a thrust attack that deals 150% weapon damage. Both attacks inflict Disintegrate on successful hits, dealing 5% weapon damage per second and reducing damage absorption by 5% for 8s. Stacks up to 3 times. 15s duration. Costs 20 Mana.

Name: Fortified Blade
Description: Gain Fortify on start, increasing damage absorption by 20% for 5s.

Name: Vicious Void
Description: +10% Critical Damage on Void Blade attacks.

Name: Leeching Blade
Description: Successful thrust attacks heal self for 5% weapon damage per Disintegrate stack on target. Scales exclusively with Focus.

Name: Oblivion
Description: Summon a circular rift of Void energy at your feet that deals 30% weapon damage per second to enemies and grants Empower to self and friendlies, increasing damage by 20%. 5m radius. 6s duration. Costs 30 Mana.

Name: Withering Oblivion
Description: Your attacks inflict Weaken to targets inside the radius, reducing their damage by 5% for 5s per hit. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Invigorating Oblivion
Description: +15 Stamina per second for self and friendlies while inside the radius.

Name: Petrifying Scream
Description: Unleash a Void-infused scream, dealing 100% weapon damage, staggering and inflicting Root to enemies 5m in front of you. Disables enemy movement for 2s. Costs 25 Mana.

Name: Bone-chilling Voice
Description: Root duration increased by 1s on targets below 50% health.

Name: Fortifying Echoes
Description: Gain Fortify for each enemy hit, increasing damage absorption by 10% for 10s per hit. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Forsaken Pact
Description: +10% damage while below 50% mana.

Name: Keen Confidence
Description: +10% Critical Chance while above 50% health.

Name: Keen Humility
Description: +10% Critical Chance while all abilities are on cooldown.

Name: Refreshing Precision
Description: +10% Cooldown Reduction on all abilities on Critical Hit.

Name: Empowering Proximity
Description: Gain Empower when casting abilities within 5m of an enemy, increasing damage by 10% for 5s. Stacks up to 3 times.

Name: Efficient Harvest
Description: Harvest Essence health drain is reduced by 50% while below 25% mana.

Name: Leeching Agony
Description: On Critical Hit, gain health equal to 15% of damage done.

Name: Refreshing Frailty
Description: +5% Cooldown Reduction on all abilities when successfully hitting enemies afflicted by 3 or more debuff stacks (can be from different debuffs).

Name: Voidcaller
Description: On successful ability hit, gain a stack of Void Essence. At 6 stacks, consume all stacks and gain a 3m aura that heals self and friendlies for 30% weapon damage and deals 30% weapon damage per second to enemies within. Healing scales exclusively with Focus. 5s duration. 20s cooldown.

Name: Orb of Decay
Description: Fire an unblockable orb that passes through enemies, deals 100% weapon damage and inflicts Disintegrate, dealing 5% weapon damage per second and reducing damage absorption by 5% for 8s. Stacks up to 3 times. At max range, it transforms into a healing orb and returns, healing friendlies for 20% weapon damage per second for 5s. Healing scales exclusively with Focus. Costs 20 Mana.

Name: Draining Orb
Description: Gain +5% mana per enemy hit by the orb.

Name: Slowing Orb
Description: The orb slows enemies already afflicted by any debuff, reducing their movement speed by 30% for 3s.

Name: Detonating Orb
Description: Press the ability input again to detonate the orb with a 4m explosion radius. Depending on the orb's phase, the explosion will either damage enemies for 100% weapon damage and apply a stack of Disintegrate or heal friendlies for 70% weapon damage. Healing scales exclusively with Focus.

Name: Baleful Tether
Description: Fire a projectile that tethers you to an enemy, Weakening it and Empowering you by 4% per second (20% maximum). The tether ends if the target moves beyond 15m. 10s duration. Costs 25 Mana.

Name: Tethered Refresh
Description: Successful hits against the tethered target reduce other Void Gauntlet cooldowns by 5%.

Name: Tethered Focus
Description: +100% mana regeneration while the tether is active.

Name: Soul Eater
Description: Regain 80% weapon damage as health if the tethered target dies. Scales exclusively with Focus.

Name: Essence Rupture
Description: Fire a projectile that inflicts Essence Rupture for 10 seconds, healing anyone that hits the target for 20% of the damage done. Does not apply to damage-over-time. Costs 25 Mana.

Name: Invigorating Rupture
Description: Players additionally receive 15 stamina when hitting the afflicted target.

Name: Overflowing Essence
Description: Friendlies within 4m of the afflicted target are healed for 80% of your weapon damage when Essence Rupture ends. Scales exclusively with Focus.

Name: Deadly Range
Description: +10% damage on successful ranged heavy attacks against targets more than 8m away.

Name: Fervent Thirst
Description: +5% Mana per successful ranged light attack against targets afflicted by your Void Gauntlet debuffs.

Name: Radiant Efficiency
Description: Mana costs are reduced by 25% while above 50% Mana.

Name: Refreshing Harvest
Description: Cooldowns are reduced by 10% per second while performing Harvest Essence.

Name: Leeching Bolts
Description: Healing from ranged heavy attacks is increased by an additional 30% of damage dealt if the target is below 50% health.

Name: Extended Suffering
Description: Successful ranged heavy attacks increase the duration of non-crowd control debuffs you have applied by 10%.

Name: Mending Evasion
Description: Dodging with full mana heals you for 80% weapon damage. Scales exclusively with Focus. 20s cooldown.

Name: Glimpse of the Void
Description: Gain a stack of Void Essence per successful ability hit. At 4 or more stacks, your next successful ranged heavy attack will instantly reset all Void Gauntlet cooldowns and remove all stacks. 15s cooldown.
Void Gauntlet
Void Gauntlet
Void Gauntlet
